links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 843
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies [from _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 16 2013]:(1) A(x) = exp( Sum_{n>=1} x^n/n * A(x^n)/(1 - x^n*A(x^n)) );(2) A(x) = exp( Sum_{n>=1} x^n/n * Sum_{d|n} d*A(x^(n/d))^d ).
prog: (PARI) {a(n)=local(A=1+x); for(i=1, n, A=exp(sum(k=1, n, x^k/k*subst(A,x,x^k)/(1-x^k*subst(A,x,x^k+x*O(x^n)) )))); polcoeff(A,n)} \\ _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 16 2013(PARI) {a(n)=local(A=1+x); for(i=1, n, A=exp(sum(k=1, n, x^k/k*sumdiv(k, d, d*subst(A,x,x^(k/d) +x*O(x^n))^d)))); polcoeff(A,n)} \\ _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 16 2013
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
